title: Electrician

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Paralyze someone during the day. Their ability will be completely nullified the night after, but they will still get their feedback as if their night action had actually gone through. For roles that gain information such as Investigator (35), they will receive completely random results.
-Paralyze someone during the night, completely stopping them from performing any abilities the following day.
